# Saved Replies for v2 Issues

## Migration Success
Thanks for the report! Glad v2 is working well for you. If you encounter any issues, please don't hesitate to open a new issue.

## Migration Issue - Need Logs
Thanks for reporting this migration issue. To help diagnose the problem, could you provide:
1. Full error logs (run with `filemanager --debug` if available)
2. Your previous v1 version number
3. Installation method (snap/manual)

Thanks for reporting! This is a known issue tracked in #XXX. We're working on a fix for v2.0.1.

Good news! This has been fixed and will be included in the next release (v2.0.1). You can track progress in PR #XXX.
